title: Career Values Sort
description: Identify which career values matter most to you right now

dimensions.label: Autonomy
dimensions.description: Freedom to make your own decisions and manage your time

dimensions.label: Impact
dimensions.description: Making a meaningful difference in others' lives or the world

dimensions.label: Growth
dimensions.description: Continuous learning, skill-building, and career advancement

dimensions.label: Stability
dimensions.description: Job security, predictable income, and low risk

dimensions.label: Creativity
dimensions.description: Expressing original ideas and solving problems in new ways

dimensions.label: Recognition
dimensions.description: Being acknowledged and respected for your contributions

dimensions.label: Connection
dimensions.description: Working with people you enjoy and building strong work relationships

dimensions.label: Compensation
dimensions.description: Earning well and having financial rewards for your work
